metadata.title: USN-4245-1 -- PySAML2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that PySAML2 incorrectly handled certain SAML files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass signature verification with arbitrary data.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4245-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-pysaml2-doc - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.1 python-pysaml2 - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.1 python3-pysaml2 - 4.0.2-0ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
